attributes.action: Introduce legislation to Ban noisy fireworks
attributes.additional_details:
People and animals have been fatally injured by errant fireworks. Fireworks are purchased by the public and used indiscriminately all year round causing a severe health and safety concern. Ex military veterans have expressed noisy fireworks invokes PTSD. Elderly people are scared and feel intimidated in their own homes by noisy fireworks. 
Parliament have failed consistently to address this issue. It is distressing to humans as well as animals and is affecting their mental well-being.
attributes.background: Introduce legislation to ban noisy fireworks. Introduce legislation to make noiseless fireworks mandatory across the UK.

rejection.details:
All fireworks produce some noise, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900

Ban all fireworks permanently, including displays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626850
